creator: urkle@outoforder.cc
text:
if I create a directory build-root underneath the apr-util src directory and run
../configure from within it,  configure fails to locate the apr_dbd_mysql.c and
doesn't build it. (I have it installed in the srcdir).

creator: urkle@outoforder.cc
text:
Created attachment 20633
Patch for dbd.m4

Patch for dbd.m4 that makes sure configure checks for apr_dbd_mysql.c within
the srcdir

creator: bojan@rexursive.com
text:
apr_dbd_mysql.c is now part of the distribution, so this should not be a problem
any more (and we don't run this test).
